thread.title: BRIEF-Allianz and CPPIB anchor investors in India's First Private Infrastructure Investment Trust

title: BRIEF-Allianz and CPPIB anchor investors in India's First Private Infrastructure Investment Trust
text:
May 9, 2018 / 10:37 AM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Allianz and CPPIB anchor investors in India's First Private Infrastructure Investment Trust Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 9 (Reuters) - Allianz SE:
* SAYS ALLIANZ AND CANADA PENSION PLAN INVESTMENT BOARD ACT AS ANCHOR INVESTORS IN THE FIRST PRIVATE INFRASTRUCTURE INVESTMENT TRUST (INVIT) IN INDIA, SPONSORED BY L&T INFRASTRUCTURE DEVELOPMENT PROJECTS LTD.
* COMBINED, CPPIB AND ALLIANZ WILL ACQUIRE 55% OF THE UNITS IN THE TRUST
* TRUST WILL FOCUS ON DEVELOPMENT OF TOLL ROADS AND ROAD INFRASTRUCTURE IN INDIA Source text: bit.ly/2I85h3w Further company coverage:
